00210     template<typename TYPE>
00211     static void glMatrixIndexPointerOES(int32_t size, int32_t type, int32_t stride, const gaia::base::Array<TYPE>& pointer_buf) {
00212         glMatrixIndexPointerOESFunc(size, type, stride, pointer_buf.array(), pointer_buf.length());
00213     }
